Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.graphics

Interface ConstTypeface

All Superinterfaces:
Const
All Known Implementing Classes:
Typeface
public interface ConstTypeface extends Const
Interface for read-only fonts. It provides methods to can gain information from a font, but none to modify it in any way. Note that this interface is expected to be implemented by a Typeface. It is not recommended to be implemented outside of the Kyanite API.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getGlyph

      Glyph getGlyph(int unicode, int characterSize, boolean bold)
      Gets a glyph information structure from the font.
      Parameters:
      unicode - the unicode (UTF-32) of the character to retrieve the glyph for
      characterSize - the character size in question
      bold - true if the bold glyph version should be returned, false for the regular version
      Returns:
      the Glyph representing the given unicode character

    • getKerning

      int getKerning(int first, int second, int characterSize)
      Gets the kerning offset between two glyphs.
      Parameters:
      first - the unicode (UTF-32) of the first character
      second - the unicode (UTF-32) of the second character
      characterSize - the character size in question
      Returns:
      the kerning offset between the two glyphs

    • getLineSpacing

      int getLineSpacing(int characterSize)
      Gets the line spacing of the font.
      Parameters:
      characterSize - the character size in question
      Returns:
      the line spacing of the font

    • getTexture

      ConstTexture getTexture(int characterSize)
      Retrieves the texture containing the font's glyphs. The texture returned is immutable.
      Parameters:
      characterSize - the character size in question
      Returns:
      the texture containing the font's glyphs of the character given size
